description: Времена Present Simple, Past Simple, Future Simple, Present Progressive, Present Perfect Progressive. Глаголы, не употребляющиеся во временах Progressive. Конструкции с to be.

sentences.eng: It has been raining since morning.
It rains almost every day in our town.
sentences.rus: В нашем [городе|город|a town] дождь идет почти каждый день.

sentences.eng: Although it didn't rain yesterday.
But it is raining right now,
and I am watching it through the window.
sentences.rus: а я [наблюдаю|наблюдать|to watch] за ним в окно.

sentences.eng: I like looking at raindrops.
Since childhood I have liked the rainy weather.
My wife is stuck in a traffic jam.
sentences.rus: Моя жена сейчас стоит в [пробке|пробка|a traffic-jam].

sentences.eng: She doesn't drive very well
although she has been driving for 10 years.
Not long ago she got in the accident.
sentences.rus: [На днях|на днях|no long ago] она попала в аварию.

sentences.eng: Yesterday we bought a new car.
She is watching the rain now
sentences.rus: Она тоже сейчас смотрит на дождь

sentences.eng: and thinking about me.
How long have we been living together?
We have been living together for 15 years.
And I never cheat my wife.
sentences.rus: И я никогда не [обманываю|обманывать|to cheat] мою жену.

sentences.eng: I love her very much.
She loves me too,
and knows all my habits.
She knows that I am not working or watching TV now;
sentences.rus: Она знает, что сейчас я не работаю и не смотрю телевизор,

sentences.eng: I am looking through the window.
Because I always look through the window, when it rains.
sentences.rus: Потому что я всегда смотрю в окно, когда идет дождь.

sentences.eng: And I'm looking through the window and I am waiting for my wife now.
sentences.rus: И сейчас я смотрю в окно и жду мою жену.
